data.name: Dark Deity - Suns Out, Swords Out
data.detailed_description:
Check Out Tyrant's Blessing!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1520760/Tyrants_Blessing/


About the Game

Sun's Out, Swords Out!

  • In this beach-based expansion to the original game, enjoy the sandy new character portraits, usable during a playthrough of the base game as well as the additional DLC content.
  • Enjoy 7 additional levels, each telling a story from the time both before and after the events of Dark Deity. Get a deeper look into characters from the main game that you always wanted to know more about, including playable chapters with Empyrean, Varic, Alastair, and Sterling.

data.short_description: Step into the world of Terrazael…and get tanned! In this DLC package, explore additional stories from before and after the events of the base game to learn more about some of your favorite characters and see how well they can rock those board shorts!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern GPU recommended
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern GPU recommended
